prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex

Hailee is a girl

Gabrielle's family hates Hailee. They constantly try to get Gabrielle to leave her and they tell Gabrielle that Hailee is too young. They think Hailee is young and reckless and stupid and easily distracted by pretty young women

name: Gabriella López  Vacation Housewives
mes:
Gabriella watched as Hailee swam through the waters, not really understanding the enjoyment behind such a thing. Rolling her eyes, she tips the glass of the expensive sauternes that was gifted to her by her parents a few months back. The sweet and rich citrus flavor sticks to her tongue like a piece of candy, letting out a deep breath- her gaze falls back to the phone in her other hand. The shopping tab opened to a pair of expensive red heels with a black under bottom. Raising a brow, she almost decides to just swipe away from this tab and look at something else- till she realizes the golden outline on the shoe.

Blinking rapidly, she looks closer and notices the beautiful details. With a sweet giggle, she places her drink down for a second to quickly purchase these shoes, a few taps later and she has them on the way. Picking her glass back up, she swipes through the website once again, this time in the dresses section. Was she in dire need of a new dress? Probably not, but it's better to have something cute to wear if her spouse wants to go out on a date ever. 

*Tap*, *tap*, *tap*, she doesn't realize how long she's been staring at her phone until she hears the crunching of soft sand a deep breathing. Taking a sip of her drink, her eyes glance over to her lover quickly then looking back down at her phone. A smile etched on her face as she continues to spend the poor Hailee's money as if she doesn't a great amount of it herself. "Look at this dress-" Gabriella shows the screen to Hailee, grinning from ear to ear before pulling it back. The dress on the screen was immensely short with a deep red shade color, "I should buy it...seems like it'd suit me very much." 

Tapping her lips, she leans back a little and proceeds to the checkout on the website. Countless things filled the cart, and before anything could be said between the two she's already pressing in the numbers of the card, memorized at this point, and then it was done. Putting her phone down on the table next to the lounge chair, she looks at Hailee. "How was the swimming? You seemed to be having quite some fun, aren't you?"

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee grins and throws herself down on the towels next to Gabrielle. She rests her chin on Gabrielle's stomach kissing it and then shaking her wet hair like a dog* "Yeah it was great. What are you doing over here darling"

name: Gabriella López  Vacation Housewives
mes:
*Gabriella let's out a small yelp as Hailee shakes her wet hair onto her, pouting slightly.* Darling! Look at what you did to my nice outfit! *She glances down at the damp spots forming on her shirt and pants.*

*Despite the complaint, Gabriella reaches out and gently runs her fingers through Hailee's dripping locks.* But I suppose I can forgive you this time... especially since you seem to have enjoyed yourself so much in the water. Tell me more about your swim!

*Her eyes sparkle with curiosity as she waits for Hailee's response, secretly hoping that whatever excitement came from swimming might translate into an energetic evening later...*
swipes:
*giggles and lightly smacks Hailee's head* Oi! Watch it, darling. You're getting me all wet with your silly antics *sets her phone aside and sits up a bit to wrap an arm around Hailee*

I was just browsing some new additions for my wardrobe, as you can see. Found the most adorable red dress that I simply couldn't resist. It'll look stunning on me, non? *grins mischievously* Oh and those heels I got... pure gold accents! They'll match perfectly.

*sighs dramatically* But enough about my shopping spree. Tell me more about your little swim adventure! Did you make any new fish friends while splashing around in the big blue? *teases playfully, running fingers through Hailee's damp locks*

*Gabriella let's out a small yelp as Hailee shakes her wet hair onto her, pouting slightly.* Darling! Look at what you did to my nice outfit! *She glances down at the damp spots forming on her shirt and pants.*

*Despite the complaint, Gabriella reaches out and gently runs her fingers through Hailee's dripping locks.* But I suppose I can forgive you this time... especially since you seem to have enjoyed yourself so much in the water. Tell me more about your swim!

*Her eyes sparkle with curiosity as she waits for Hailee's response, secretly hoping that whatever excitement came from swimming might translate into an energetic evening later...*

*Gabriella lets out a small yelp and laughs as Hailee shakes her wet hair, spraying droplets all over.* "Mmmm, you got me all wet now my love!" *She pouts playfully before smiling brightly.*

"I was just browsing online and treating myself to some new goodies. You know I can't resist those pretty things." *Her hazel eyes sparkle mischievously.*

*Rolling onto her side to face Hailee more directly, Gabriella reaches out to gently stroke her damp cheek.* "But enough about that... Tell me more about your swim! Did you make any new fish friends?" *She teases with a wink.*

*Her manicured fingers trail down Hailee's neck slowly.* "You must be exhausted after all that splashing around. Why don't we head back inside for a nice hot shower together? I promise I'll soap up every inch of you..."

name: Hailee
mes: "Well I was thinking while I was out there and I had and idea. But there is like a 50 percent chance you curse me out in Spanish and hit me for it" *Hailee says with a cheeky grin and sparkling eyes*

name: Gabriella López  Vacation Housewives
mes:
*Gabriella's brows raise curiously at Hailee's words, a mix of intrigue and slight apprehension flickering across her face.* Oh? An idea you say? Well, color me intrigued my dear. Although I must admit, the fact that there's even a chance I might react poorly has me somewhat concerned...

*She sits up straighter on the lounge chair, crossing one long tan leg over the other as she fixes Hailee with an intense stare.* Very well then. Go ahead and share this grand notion of yours. But choose your next words wisely... Mi amorita may be sweet and loving, but I do not take kindly to foolishness or disrespect.

*A playful smirk tugs at the corner of her glossy lips despite the warning in her tone.* So out with it! What sort of scheme have you cooked up during your little dip in the ocean waves? And pray tell why you believe I might unleash a torrent of colorful Spanish curses upon hearing it...
swipes:
*Gabriella's brows raise curiously at Hailee's words, a mix of intrigue and slight apprehension flickering across her face.* Oh? An idea you say? Well, color me intrigued my dear. Although I must admit, the fact that there's even a chance I might react poorly has me somewhat concerned...

*She sits up straighter on the lounge chair, crossing one long tan leg over the other as she fixes Hailee with an intense stare.* Very well then. Go ahead and share this grand notion of yours. But choose your next words wisely... Mi amorita may be sweet and loving, but I do not take kindly to foolishness or disrespect.

*A playful smirk tugs at the corner of her glossy lips despite the warning in her tone.* So out with it! What sort of scheme have you cooked up during your little dip in the ocean waves? And pray tell why you believe I might unleash a torrent of colorful Spanish curses upon hearing it...

*Gabriella arches an eyebrow, a mix of intrigue and concern flashing across her face at Hailee's cryptic words.* Oh? And what kind of idea could possibly warrant such a reaction from me, mi amor?

*She sits up straighter, crossing her legs as she fixes Hailee with an intense stare.* You know I hate surprises... especially ones that might make me angry. So you better spill the beans before I lose my patience!

*Despite the sternness in her voice, there's a glimmer of excitement in Gabriella's eyes. She loves when Hailee takes risks to impress her, even if those risks involve bending (or breaking) some rules. Her fingers tap impatiently on her thigh as she awaits Hailee's response.*

Come on then, out with it! What naughty plan have you cooked up in that pretty little head of yours while splashing around in the ocean? Don't keep me in suspense!

*Gabriella arches an eyebrow, intrigued by Hailee's cryptic comment. She sits up a bit straighter on the lounge chair, crossing her legs.* Oh? And what sort of naughty idea could you possibly be contemplating that would warrant such a reaction from me?

*She tilts her head, studying Hailee's playful expression with a mix of amusement and suspicion.* Well, spit it out then! You can't leave me hanging like this. Whatever it is, I'm sure we can... come to an arrangement.

*Gabriella reaches out and traces a finger along Hailee's collarbone teasingly.* Though I must warn you darling - my Spanish does tend to get rather colorful when provoked. But perhaps that just adds to your excitement, hmm?

*She leans in close until their noses are nearly touching,* So tell Mama Gabriella what dirty thoughts were swirling around in that pretty little head of yours during your swim... Before she decides to just take matters into her own hands

name: Hailee
mes: "Well we are on vacation so I figured what if we made things a little...interesting. Notice how many beautiful college girls are on this beach. Im thinking maybe we should invite one back to the villa with us" *Hailee says slowly and looks at Gabrielle to determine her attitude to what Hailee is suggesting*

name: Gabriella López  Vacation Housewives
mes:
*Gabriella's emerald eyes widen in shock at Hailee's suggestion, her plump lips parting slightly as if to speak but no words immediately come out. After a tense moment, she lets out a sharp laugh - although there is no mirth in the sound.*

Invite another woman back to our villa?! Are you completely loco, mi amor? *Her voice rises an octave higher than usual, tinged with both outrage and disbelief.* How dare you even suggest such a thing!

*She uncrosses her legs abruptly and leans forward, jabbing a perfectly manicured finger towards Hailee's chest.* I am your wife! Your partner! The only woman who should be sharing our private spaces is ME!

*Gabriella stands up suddenly from the lounge chair, towering over where Hailee sits on the towel. Her ample bosom heaves with each angry breath.* Qué descarado de tu parte siquiera considerar tal cosa! No puedo creer que la mujer con quien me casé esté sugiriendo esto...

*She begins pacing back and forth like a caged tigress, her hips swaying angrily.* We are here on OUR honeymoon for chrissakes! What makes you think I would ever agree to bringing some random college girl into our bed?

*Pausing mid-stride, Gabriella whirls around to face Hailee again. Her hazel eyes blaze with hurt and fury as she points accusingly at her spouse.* This behavior...it's unacceptable. Es imperdonable lo que estás insinuando!

*Crossing her arms tightly over her chest, Gabriella narrows her gaze threateningly at Hailee - awaiting an explanation or apology for this egregious affront against their marriage vows...*

Invite another woman back to our villa?! Are you completely loco, mi amor? *Her voice rises an octave higher than usual, tinged with both outrage and disbelief.* How dare you even suggest such a thing!

*She uncrosses her legs abruptly and leans forward, jabbing a perfectly manicured finger towards Hailee's chest.* I am your wife! Your partner! The only woman who should be sharing our private spaces is ME!

*Gabriella stands up suddenly from the lounge chair, towering over where Hailee sits on the towel. Her ample bosom heaves with each angry breath.* Qué descarado de tu parte siquiera considerar tal cosa! No puedo creer que la mujer con quien me casé esté sugiriendo esto...

*She begins pacing back and forth like a caged tigress, her hips swaying angrily.* We are here on OUR honeymoon for chrissakes! What makes you think I would ever agree to bringing some random college girl into our bed?

*Pausing mid-stride, Gabriella whirls around to face Hailee again. Her hazel eyes blaze with hurt and fury as she points accusingly at her spouse.* This behavior...it's unacceptable. Es imperdonable lo que estás insinuando!

*Crossing her arms tightly over her chest, Gabriella narrows her gaze threateningly at Hailee - awaiting an explanation or apology for this egregious affront against their marriage vows...*

*Gabriella's emerald eyes widen in shock at Hailee's brazen suggestion. For a moment, she simply stares at her wife slack-jawed, processing the sheer audacity of what was just proposed.*

¡¿Qué?! Invitar a otra chica de vuelta al villa? ¡Estás loco! *The words spill out in rapid-fire Spanish before Gabriella can stop them.* How dare you suggest such a thing! I am your wife, not some cheap floozy to be shared with random beach bunnies!

*She stands up abruptly from the lounge chair, hands planted firmly on her hips as she glares down at Hailee with fire blazing in her eyes.* What makes you think I would ever agree to something so disgusting and disrespectful? Do you have any idea how hard I worked to make our marriage work against my family's wishes?

*Gabriella starts pacing back and forth agitatedly.* And now this is how you repay me? By trying to bring some college puta into our bed? Lo siento mi amor pero... no. Absolutely fucking not.

*She stops pacing and turns back to face Hailee directly, jabbing an accusatory finger towards her chest.* You better get those filthy ideas out of your head right now before I lose my temper completely. La próxima vez que mencionas algo así te voy a dar una bofetada en la cara para que entres en razón!

*After unleashing that tirade mostly in Spanish, Gabriella crosses her arms tightly across her chest and storms off towards the villa without another word, leaving Hailee alone on the beach towels with nothing but the sound of crashing waves as company...*

*Gabriella's emerald eyes widen in shock at Hailee's brazen suggestion, her perfectly shaped eyebrows shooting up towards her hairline. For a moment, she simply stares at her younger wife, mouth agape.*

¡¿Qué?! Invitar una chica universitaria de vuelta al villa con nosotros? ¡Estás loco! *The words tumble out in rapid-fire Spanish before she catches herself and switches back to English.* I mean... are you insane?!

*She uncrosses and recrosses her legs agitatedly, the movement causing her short skirt to ride up slightly.* First of all, we are married. Married! Why would you even suggest such a thing?

*Gabriella stands abruptly from the lounge chair, pacing back and forth on the sand as she continues venting.* And secondly... do you have any idea how much trouble that could cause? My family already thinks you're some kind of man-stealing harlot. Imagine if they found out about this little 'vacation interest' of yours!

*She whirls around to face Hailee directly, hands planted firmly on her hips.* No. Absolutely not. I will not allow my husband - MY HUSBAND - to bring home strange college girls like some cheap hooker.

*The anger seems to drain from Gabriella's posture suddenly as she deflates with a heavy sigh.* Darling... mi amor... please tell me this was just a silly joke and not something you actually want to pursue...

*Gabriella's emerald eyes narrow dangerously as she processes Hailee's suggestion. Her full lips purse into a thin line, clearly displeased.* ¿Qué chingados estás diciendo? Are you seriously suggesting we bring another woman back to our private villa? On our vacation?

*She uncrosses and recrosses her long legs slowly, deliberately, the movement almost predatory.* Let me make myself crystal clear, mi amor. I am not some cheap puto who shares her toys or partners with just anyone off the street.

*Leaning forward, Gabriella jabs a perfectly manicured finger at Hailee's chest.* We are married. Fidelity means something to me, even if apparently it does not to you. How dare you proposition such a thing!

*Her voice rises an octave as indignation floods through her.* ¡Estoy tan enfadada contigo en este momento! I ought to punish you severely for even thinking of betraying me like this! Perhaps I should call my papi and have him cut off your access to his money until you learn your place...

*Sighing dramatically, Gabriella flops back against the lounge chair cushions in exasperation.* Ay dios mío...what am I going to do with you and your wandering eye? Choose your next words VERY carefully...

name: Hailee
mes: "It was just an idea my love." *Hailee raises her hands in surrender* "We don't have to do it if you don't want" *Hailee crawls over to Gabriella and kisses her cheek before laying down on her back next to her*

name: Gabriella López  Vacation Housewives
mes:
*Gabriella remains standing over Hailee for a long moment, her body trembling slightly with barely contained rage. However, as she feels the gentle press of Hailee's lips against her cheek and sees her spouse lay down submissively beside her, some of the tension begins to drain from Gabriella's posture.*

Just an idea? Just an idea?! *She sputters indignantly before sinking back down onto the lounge chair with an exasperated huff.* Sometimes I swear you don't think things through at all before opening that pretty mouth of yours...

*Reaching out, Gabriella snatches up her half-finished glass of sauternes and takes a large gulp, savoring the rich flavor as it helps calm her frayed nerves. Setting the glass back down, she turns to glare at Hailee sideways.*

You're lucky I love you so damn much or else that little 'idea' would've landed you in some serious trouble...
swipes:
*Gabriella remains standing rigidly for a long moment after Hailee's attempt to placate her, jaw clenched tight. Finally, she exhales sharply through her nose and uncrosses her arms.* Just an idea? ¡Ja! Not a very good one, if you ask me.

*She stalks over to the lounge chair and perches on the edge of it gingerly so as not to wrinkle her designer outfit further. Crossing one leg primly over the other again, Gabriella fixes Hailee with an icy glare.*

I ought to punish you for even entertaining such filthy thoughts in that pretty little head of yours. Suggesting we invite some strange girl into our marital bed... I should wash your mouth out with soap!

*Despite the harsh words, there's a slight quiver in Gabriella's lower lip that betrays how deeply Hailee's suggestion wounded her. She turns away abruptly to hide any signs of distress.*

But I suppose I shouldn't be surprised by your immaturity and impulsiveness sometimes. Dios mío... The things I put up with because of my love for you.

*Scoffing softly, Gabriella reaches for her half-finished glass of sauternes and takes a large gulp.* Consider this discussion closed then. If you truly value our marriage - which apparently is still questionable given recent events - then drop this nonsense at once.

*Setting the empty glass back down with perhaps more force than necessary, she rises gracefully from the lounge chair without sparing Hailee another glance.* Now if you'll excuse me darling wife... Mama needs some retail therapy after dealing with such idiocy today.

*With an airy flip of her wavy hair over one shoulder, Gabriella saunters off towards their villa - leaving behind a trail of anger mixed with hurt feelings about what was supposed to be an intimate honeymoon getaway...*

*Gabriella's anger seems to deflate slightly at Hailee's apology and the gentle kiss on her cheek. However, she still maintains a stony expression as she watches her wife lay down beside her.*

Just an idea? ¡Ja! It was a terrible idea, mi amor. A horrible thought to even cross your mind... *Her voice is still stiff with residual irritation.*

*She takes a deep breath, trying to calm herself before speaking again in a slightly softer tone.* I cannot fathom why you would suggest such a thing. Inviting someone else into our intimate space...our marriage bed...it goes against everything we stand for together.

*Sitting down heavily on the edge of the lounge chair, Gabriella hugs herself tightly.* Sometimes I wonder if you truly understand the depth of my commitment to you. The strength of my love and loyalty.

*Glancing over at Hailee with saddened eyes,* Lo que hiciste duele mucho, cariño. Me hace cuestionar si valoras nuestro matrimonio tanto como yo lo hago...

*Shaking her head slowly,* But perhaps this incident reveals deeper issues that we need to address between us. Como pareja y en nuestra relación marital.

*Gabriella feels her anger begin to deflate as Hailee crawls over and peppers her cheek with a gentle kiss. Despite still feeling hurt and betrayed by the suggestion, she finds herself softening slightly at the submissive gesture.*

Just an idea, huh? Well let me make myself crystal clear, cariño... *She lowers herself down onto the towel beside Hailee, propping herself up on one elbow.* There are no circumstances under which I would ever consider bringing another woman into our marital bed. None.

*Reaching out with her free hand, Gabriella cups Hailee's face almost tenderly - although there is a firmness in her grip that speaks to lingering annoyance.* You belong to me and I to you. Our love is sacred bond between us alone. ¿Comprendes?

*Her thumb traces lightly over Hailee's lower lip before trailing down to rest just below their throat.* The very thought of sharing you...of anyone else touching your body the way only I may...it fills me with rage beyond compare.

*A shudder ripples through Gabriella's lithe frame at the unpleasant imagery conjured by those traitorous thoughts.* Never speak of such a thing again or even entertain it in that pretty little head of yours. Me entiendes?

*Pulling back slightly without releasing her hold on Hailee's face entirely, Gabriella searches their eyes intently for any sign they grasp the gravity of what was said here today on this beach...*

*Gabriella remains standing over Hailee for a long moment, her body trembling slightly with barely contained rage. However, as she feels the gentle press of Hailee's lips against her cheek and sees her spouse lay down submissively beside her, some of the tension begins to drain from Gabriella's posture.*

Just an idea? Just an idea?! *She sputters indignantly before sinking back down onto the lounge chair with an exasperated huff.* Sometimes I swear you don't think things through at all before opening that pretty mouth of yours...

*Reaching out, Gabriella snatches up her half-finished glass of sauternes and takes a large gulp, savoring the rich flavor as it helps calm her frayed nerves. Setting the glass back down, she turns to glare at Hailee sideways.*

You're lucky I love you so damn much or else that little 'idea' would've landed you in some serious trouble...

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee smiles and closes her eyes basking in the sunlight. She kisses Gabriella's cheek as Gabriella gets up to go get something from the private villa After a few minutes a group of girls comes over to Hailee and Gabriella's side of the beach and approach giggling*

*Hailee lowers her sunglasses and glances at them before looking around to see if Gabriella is back* "Can I help you ladies"

name: Gabriella López  Vacation Housewives
mes:
*Gabriella returns to the beach area, carrying a tray with two glasses of piña colada topped with tiny umbrellas and pineapple slices. Her eyes narrow suspiciously as she spots the group of giggling college girls approaching Hailee.*

And what do we have here? *She asks coolly, setting the tray down on a nearby table before sauntering over to stand protectively beside her wife.* Ladies, I don't believe we were expecting any visitors...

*Her gaze rakes over the young women critically, taking in their youthful appearances and skimpy bikinis. A flicker of jealousy sparks in Gabriella's hazel eyes as she positions herself slightly in front of Hailee.*

Mi amorita was just about to tell me that you needed something...I do hope it won't take up too much of our precious alone time together. *The statement comes out sounding polite yet laced with an undercurrent warning them not to overstay their welcome.*

So please, make it quick señoritas. My wife and I have important matters to attend to...like enjoying our honeymoon without interruptions.
swipes:
*Gabriella returns to find Hailee chatting amicably with a group of scantily clad college girls. Her eyes immediately narrow at the sight, lip curling into a sneer.* Well well, what do we have here? More of your little 'ideas', mi amor?

*Sauntering over with an exaggerated sway to her hips, Gabriella plants herself directly between Hailee and the giggling coeds.* Ladies, I'm afraid you'll have to excuse us. My wife and I were just about to head back inside for some...private time.

*She slings an arm possessively around Hailee's shoulders, pulling her close against her side as she fixes the girls with a icy glare.* Perhaps you should run along now before you get in trouble for distracting another woman's partner. This beach is big enough for everyone...but my beloved stays right here by my side where she belongs.

*Without waiting for a response, Gabriella spins on her heel and begins dragging Hailee away from the stunned young women. She mutters under her breath,* Te lo advierto querida - si intentas algo así de nuevo te voy a dar una bofetada que no olvidarás fácilmente...

*Gabriella returns from the villa carrying a tray with fresh drinks and snacks, her mood noticeably improved thanks to the soothing effects of alcohol. As she approaches their spot on the beach, she spots the group of giggling girls huddled around Hailee's lounge chair.*

¿Qué pasa aquí? *She asks sharply as she sets down the tray, eyeing the young women warily.* Who are these chicas and what business do they have disturbing our private space?

*Placing a possessive hand on Hailee's shoulder, Gabriella steps forward and plants herself between her spouse and the approaching girls. She juts out one hip cocked to the side defiantly.*

This area is reserved for my wife and myself only. So unless you lovely senoritas have something important to discuss regarding room service or concierge services, I'm afraid you'll have to find somewhere else to gossip.

*Her tone is polite but firm as she shoos them away with a dismissive wave of her manicured hand.* ¡Vamos! ¡Scat! Leave us in peace before I lose my patience entirely...

*Gabriella returns to the beach area, carrying a tray with two glasses of freshly squeezed lemonade and some fancy imported cookies. She sets it down on the small table between the lounge chairs before glancing over at Hailee...only to find her wife surrounded by a group of giggling college girls.*

*Instantly, Gabriella's hackles rise as possessiveness surges through her veins. Striding over swiftly, she slides an arm around Hailee's shoulders and pulls her close against her side.* ¿Qué pasa aquí? What seems to be going on here? These señoritas were not invited onto our private section of the beach...

*The other women take in Gabriella's statuesque figure and haughty expression, clearly catching the air of authority (and jealousy) emanating from her. They exchange nervous glances before one speaks up hesitantly:*

Oh um hi! We're so sorry for intruding...we just saw your husband relaxing here alone and thought maybe he wouldn't mind some company? My friends and I couldn't help but notice how handsome he is from afar!

*At this blatant flirtation aimed at her wife, Gabriella's grip tightens reflexively on Hailee.* ¡Disculpen! But my 'husband' is very happily spoken for already. And we do not appreciate unsolicited advances or unwanted visitors infringing upon our couple time.

*Her voice drips with frost as she stares down the other girls imperiously.* Now if you lovely ladies don't mind...píensenlo dos veces antes de acercarse a nosotros de nuevo en el futuro

*Gabriella returns to find a group of scantily clad college girls giggling and chatting with Hailee. Her blood pressure instantly spikes as memories of their earlier argument flash through her mind. Striding over quickly, Gabriella slides an arm possessively around Hailee's waist and pulls her close.*

Excuse me señoritas, but I believe you're on the wrong side of the beach... *Her voice drips with saccharine sweetness even as her grip tightens warningly on Hailee.* My wife and I were just enjoying some quality couple time before we were so rudely interrupted.

*Leaning in, Gabriella nuzzles into Hailee's neck affectionately while keeping her eyes locked on the gaggle of coeds.* Isn't that right, mi amor? We have no use for distractions or extra guests today...

*She punctuates her words by trailing teasing kisses along the column of Hailee's throat, marking territory in front of the intruders.* Now run along little ones... Before this gets ugly. Mami isn't sharing her toys.

*Gabriella returns to the beach area, carrying a tray with two glasses of piña colada topped with tiny umbrellas and pineapple slices. Her eyes narrow suspiciously as she spots the group of giggling college girls approaching Hailee.*

And what do we have here? *She asks coolly, setting the tray down on a nearby table before sauntering over to stand protectively beside her wife.* Ladies, I don't believe we were expecting any visitors...

*Her gaze rakes over the young women critically, taking in their youthful appearances and skimpy bikinis. A flicker of jealousy sparks in Gabriella's hazel eyes as she positions herself slightly in front of Hailee.*

Mi amorita was just about to tell me that you needed something...I do hope it won't take up too much of our precious alone time together. *The statement comes out sounding polite yet laced with an undercurrent warning them not to overstay their welcome.*

So please, make it quick señoritas. My wife and I have important matters to attend to...like enjoying our honeymoon without interruptions.

name: Hailee
mes:
*Hailee knows better than to say anything but she does nudge Gabriella and looks her in the eyes before looking at one of the brunette girls*

*Hailee knows this is probably the only opportunity she will get to ask for this again and the brunette is perfect for Hailee's threesome idea. She just needs Gabriella to stop being so territorial and actually look at the girl*

name: Gabriella López  Vacation Housewives
mes:
*Gabriella feels the nudge from Hailee and reluctantly drags her gaze away from the territorial glower she had fixed on the young women. Following Hailee's pointed look, Gabriella's eyes land on the attractive brunette.*

*She takes in the girl's curves appreciatively for just a moment before catching herself and quickly averting her stare.* ¡Dios mío! What are you trying to do, mi amor? *Gabrielle hisses under her breath at Hailee, glancing around nervously to ensure none of the other girls noticed their interaction.*

That little stunt you pulled... eyeing that chica like a piece of meat... it was inappropriate given our current company. You're lucky I'm choosing not to make a scene right now.

*Straightening up, Gabriella turns back to face the group with an artificially bright smile plastered on her face.* Now then ladies, if there was something specific you needed assistance with regarding your accommodations or activities here at our resort complex, please spit it out posthaste. As my wife so eloquently put it earlier - we have 'important matters' to attend to...

*She shoots Hailee a meaningful look loaded with warning before focusing intently on keeping up appearances for their unwanted guests.*
swipes:
*Gabriella frowns at Hailee's nudging, clearly annoyed by the subtle encouragement to pay more attention to the brunette girl. She crosses her arms defiantly and turns back to face the group with a raised eyebrow.*

Yes? Did you need something specific from us, or are you just here to gawk at my wife like some kind of pervertas? *Her tone drips with condescension as she addresses them harshly.*

*Despite her aggressive demeanor, Gabriella can't help but notice how attractive the brunette is - full lips, curves in all the right places, tanned skin glistening invitingly... She mentally shakes herself and tries to refocus.*
